title: Can anyone help me find which font this is?
content:
Can anybody please tell me which font this is?? I tried those sites which tell you but then they dont look the same. Any help would be really really appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018215939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/product_btn_4987.jpg)
author: roshanahluwalia

comments.content: I cannot find out the font used to spell Product. I am dying here. Please help!
Getting too old to see the small graphic... but somewhere in the neighborhood of Bank Gothic... the foot of the R, though, seems different though...
THANK YOU, so much. This is pretty close to what I need. You Sir, have made my day!!!
